text: Disney Channel goes behind the scenes to
get special effect secrets from the cast
of The allnew decom versus monster
acting with monsters was really
different than anything I've ever done
before you have special effects which is
explosions and Fun Stuff they're using
green screen and they can animate in the
atmosphere it amazes me the detail that
people put into this like the roof of
the mansion looks so real we shot a a
big sequence on the top of the roof it
was really cool to be high above the
floor of the set I was really fun when
to shoot I'm on top of the bean no when
I had to fall off the roof the harness
caught me so it felt like I was flying
the sets the costumes the props these
just about every kind of special effect
I think you can use it's awesome girl
versus monster premieres Friday October
12th at 87 Central on Disney Channel
